author: bchain99
content: excited for this one: https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-five/blob/main/projects/project-ideas.md#json-rpc-in-geth . It would be great to have tracing part of the client library like other methods(`StorageAt`, `BalanceAt`) Its very laborious to use the tracer in just HTTP as its painful to correctly specify the inputs but mostly typing the output in golang is very painful. need to copy the types from the Geth main repo
